item.title: How to use several git accounts in same computer
item.description: Sometimes we have the need of using several git accounts. We can be doing different projects, working for different companies, maybe using different collaborative version control tools and other reasons. This leads to different problems. For example you make commits with the wrong account and forces you to amend them or you cannot interact with the tools because it needs different authentication. To solve this we can make use of the git config possibilities.
